projects.title: Shotz
projects.description: A dynamically loaded webpage showing dummy film locations and dummy movies. Each location has a number representing how many movies it was used in.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Ajax, jQuery, Chrome Modules, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Adoption Site
projects.description: A small project where bootstrap and information is dynamically placed on the page. A filter method was also placed to search what type of animal you want.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Chrome Modules, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Language Translator
projects.description: A simple translator using JS objects and for loops to take a limited number of entries and print the translation to the DOM
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Sorting Hat
projects.description: A simple RNG funtion to place pseudo students into fictional Harry Potter house names with conditional Bootstrap styling
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap, Version Control with Github
